item.name: Get Nearest Retail Branches By Postal Code

request.description: Returns the queue information for the specified branch

body.raw:
{
  "header": {
    "ID": "{{$guid}}",
    "application": "string",
    "bank": "NBG",
    "hostSession": "string",
    "channel": "string",
    "customer": 0,
    "logitude": 0,
    "latitude": 0,
    "go4moreMember": true,
    "TAN": "string"
  },
  "payload": {
    "branchCode": "090",
    "reason": "General",
    "comments": "Please Issue a Ticket for me",
    "deviceId": "{{device_id}}",
    "pushNotificationId": "string",
    "pushNotificationType": "Android",
    "lang": "string"
  }
}

request.description: Creates a Ticket for the specified device to the specified branch
Cancels a Ticket for specified the device
Submits whether a Ticket was useful
Submits a rating for a Ticket
Submits feedback about a ticket that was not useful
